data.title: Great Basin National Park (U.S. National Park Service)
data.text:
In Park

Bookstore

Western National Parks Association Bookstores are located in both visitor centers. Open year round. Call (775) 234-7529 for more information.

Cafe and Gift Shop

Information can be found on the restaurants page.

In Baker, Nevada

Sugar, Salt and Malt

Open spring through fall

Services: Offering coffee, pastries, sandwiches, dinner, and more.

487 Grill

Open spring through fall

Services: Lunch and dinner service.

Sandra's Mexican Food

Hours Vary

Services: Lunch and dinner service.

Stargazer Inn & Bristlecone General Store

(775) 234-7323

Open January 1 - November 30

Services: Stargazer Inn & Bristlecone General Store are open all year long offering rooms; outdoor spaces; coffee and conversation; an outlet of groceries, outdoor gear, clothing, books and maps; and a showcase for local artisans.

Whispering Elms Motel, Campground, & RV Park

(775) 234-9900

Open spring - October 31

Services: Offering 25 full- and partial-service RV sites, six clean motel rooms, bar, large grassy area for tents, many shady trees, coin laundromat, clean showers, free WI-FI, and satellite TV for motel guests. Bar open daily.

Baker Sinclair Gas Station

Open year round

Services: Self-serve gas and diesel available 24 hours (credit or debit card only). Laundromat, public restrooms, public and camper's pay showers.

Parkview Services

(435) 406-1011

Hours vary

Services: Mechanic. Vehicle services and flat tire repairs in Baker.

Baker Post Office

(775) 234-7231

Open year round, hours vary

Services: Full service U.S. post office.

(775) 296-1432

Open year round

Services: Hourly dog boarding.

Near Baker, Nevada

The Border Inn

(775) 234-7300

Open year round

Location: 8 miles northeast of Baker, on US Hwy 6 & 50 (state line).

Services: Gas, diesel, ATM, electric vehicle charging, motel, restaurant, bar, slots, pool table, video games, showers, dump station, phones, free Wi-Fi, laundry, and souvenirs. Convenience store with ice. Offers 22 RV campsites (full hookups and pull-through spaces).

Hidden Canyon Ranch

(775) 234-7172

Open year round

Location: 14 miles south of Baker

Services: Bed and breakfast in luxury in our lodge. Balcony-view rooms, private bath, king bed, luxury bedding, small fridge, and full-cooked breakfast included. Full meal packages available by reservation only. Relaxing environment by running water, fly fishing (bring your own equipment), and wonderful hiking. Great for a private getaway or design-your-own fitness vacation. 14 miles from Baker, in the mountains at the eastern edge of the park, with private access to Big Wash Trail. Reservations required.

Sacramento Pass (BLM)

(775) 289-1800

Open year round

Location: 15 miles north of Baker on US Hwy 6 & 50.

Services: RV and tent camping available.

Major's Station RV Park

(775) 591-0347

Open year round

Location: About 40 miles west, towards Ely, on US Hwy 6 & 50.

Services: Offering tent camping and RV camping with hook-ups available. A bar, showers, and laundry services on-site.

AAA Nevada roadside assistance

(800) 222-4357

Services: Towing and roadside assistance in Nevada

Many alternative, local options exist on sites like Airbnb and Hipcamp.

The Great Basin Business & Tourism Council website provides detailed information on services in the Baker area.
